DOC.brief_summary: The present randomized , control , parallel-grouped trial include twenty patient ( age 20 54 year ) suffer Miller 's class I II gingival recession . Patients randomly assign two equal group ; control group ; coronally advance flap subepithelial connective tissue graft ( CAF+SCTG ) test group ; coronally advance flap amnion chorion allograft membrane ( CAF+AC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Amnion Chorion Membrane Comparison Subepithelial Connective Tissue Graft Gingival Recession Coverage
DOC.detailed_description: The participant randomly assign receive coronally advanced flap ( CAF ) amnion chorion membrane CAF subepithelial connective tissue graft use simple randomization procedure 1:1 allocation ratio . A computer generate randomization list drawn faculty member involve recruitment . Allocation concealment achieve seal coded opaque envelope contain treatment perform enrolled subject base randomized number . Consequently , patient allocate either AC membrane ( intervention ) SCTG ( control ) group . The sealed envelope contain treatment assignment open time surgery number pick another person operator .
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 18 60 year old . Subjects facial gingival recession defect anterior premolar teeth classify either class I II defect accord Miller 's classification . Subjects able tolerate surgical periodontal procedure . Accepts 6 month followup period . Current former smoker . Pregnant female . Subjects receive periodontal therapy minimum 6 month prior study . Subjects take drug know interfere wound healing . Subjects unacceptable oral hygiene plaque index > 2 . Teeth noncarious cervical lesion , cervical caries malalignment .
